item.title: Web Development is an utter mess
item.description: I started learning HTML and CSS a decade ago, 2015. Back in intermediate school my teacher introduced me to a tool known as neocities. I started using it obsessively to express and to present things in my class. And over the next decade I stuck to neocities for the benefits that it gave to me for free. But I’ve always desired my own website domain and learning how to make a website “professionally”.
